text: Youxie ren, zai zhenzhu zhi wai, bie you chongbai, dangzuo zhenzhu de pidi; tamen jing'ai naxie pidi, xiang jing'ai zhenzhu yiyang ──xindao de renmen, dui yu jing'ai zhenzhu, youwei kenzhi ──dang bu yi de ren, kanjian xingfa de shihou, jiaruo tamen zhidao yiqie quanli dou shi zhenzhu de, zhenzhu shi xingfa yanli de.
